### MERGE

```{r}
in13 <- read.csv("in13.csv")
data1 <- read.csv("data1.csv")

print("an13")
nrow(an13); ncol(an13)
print("-----")
print("in13")
nrow(in13); ncol(in13)
print("-----")
print("data1")
nrow(data1); ncol(data1)
```
```{r}
#colnames(an13)
#print("-----\n")
colnames(in13)
#print("-----\n")
#colnames(data1)
```



```{r}
names(in13)[8] <- "codcliente"
```


```{r}
subtotal <- merge(an13, in13, by="codcliente")
ncol(subtotal); nrow(subtotal)
```

```{r}
total <- merge(subtotal, data1, by = "codcliente")
ncol(total); nrow(total)
```

```{r}
total
```
